summary: The Stop the Screwworms With Active Readiness and Mitigation Act of 2025 (Stop the SWARM Act of 2025) directs the Secretary of Agriculture to submit a report to Congress on the New World screwworm readiness and response initiative. The report is to focus on domestic readiness, including constructing a production facility; sterile fly production technology and other eradication tools; and the benefits and barriers to enhanced domestic sterile fly production. The bill aims to protect against and control outbreaks of New World screwworms.
